sense.def:
Morals
so načela in prepričanja o tem, kaj je prav in kaj narobe.

seg.quote: Business morals nowadays are very low.
Films like this are a danger to public morals.

sense.def:
Moral
se uporablja za stvari, ki so povezane s pravilnim in neustreznim vedenjem.

seg.quote: I have noticed a fall in moral standards.
It is our moral duty to stay.
It is morally wrong not to do more to help the poor.

sense.def:
Kdor je
moral
, se vede tako, kot je prepričan, da je prav.

seg.quote: If parents are themselves honest and moral, their children will be too.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekomu ponudi podporo, ki je
moral
, ga spodbuja pri tistem, kar dela, in mu izraža svoje odobravanje.

seg.quote: I looked across to give moral support to my colleagues.

sense.def:
The moral of a story or event
je tisto, kar se iz neke zgodbe ali dogodka naučimo o tem, kako je treba ravnati.

seg.quote: The moral is clear: you must never marry for money.
